about_the_game:
In this city built around the Gate of Origins,

head to the tavern to meet like-minded companions,

recruit seasoned adventurers at the guild,

arm yourself and your allies with crystals and potions,

and embark on your journey to the Origin Realm!

Game Features

  • Very easy to get into the game flow and a rich variety of growth systems!

  • Up to 16 characters can join the adventure, each with their own unique combat style and skills!

  • There is a wide variety of enemies, and defeating each type grants corresponding imprints.

    Imprints can be equipped on characters to enhance their combat power. Repeatedly defeating the same enemy can also increase the imprint's level!

    Each character can equip multiple imprints; the more enemies you defeat, the more diverse the imprints become, and the stronger their abilities!

  • A wealth of equipment and enhancement crystals available for collection and purchase, along with flexible and varied imprint ability combinations, make the adventurer's growth strategic and diverse!

  • Almost every combat skill has proficiency; the more you use it, the stronger the skill becomes!

  • Losing a battle does not end the game; instead, you enter the next cycle, retaining all skill proficiency and acquired imprints.

    The power of the cycle has levels; the higher the level, the greater the rewards from adventures!

    This means that even if you continuously lose, your combat power will accumulate until you become invincible!

  • Over 26 dungeons with different styles and enemies await players to explore and conquer in various ways!

highlighted.name: The crumbling Seat of the Sky

name: Abyalkin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 7/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Who am I? Where am I? It doesn’t matter; I’m here to slay enemies! Head to the dungeon, continuously fight, and eliminate powerful foes. Absorb the power of imprints and challenge the mightiest dungeons in Abyalkin!
